quality_rest: For those who appreciate quality rest.
our_services: We specialize in hotels ranging from COMFORT to LUXURY levels all over the world.
online_office: Our office is our page on INSTAGRAM. You can book a trip, sign a contract, and make a payment fully online, receiving the necessary documents via email.
task: The task of SELECT.SUN travel bureau is to find the perfect price-quality option for you, taking into account your preferences.
booking: How does the booking process work?
booking_process: For new clients, we first assess the possibility of providing suitable options based on your parameters and send an initial selection. Then, a consultation agreement is drawn up. The consultation fee is deducted from the total tour price upon booking.
review_1: Thank you so much! You are wonderful, even booking the tour brought positive emotions.
review_2: The hotel is gorgeous, we are thrilled, I regret not being here earlier. Thank you! It's love at first sight.
review_3: We want to express our deep gratitude for your active participation in solving issues and offering help. You are a super responsive and kind person, and a great professional in your field!
review_4: Anastasia, this hotel is divine! Thank you so much for your help! We are with you forever.
review_5: Anastasia, hello, I am writing to you with great gratitude! Our first vacation with kids was nerve-wracking, and booking the tour ourselves was scary. I am so glad I found you!
review_6: Thank you so much for our vacation! For the support and help with any question. Now I know who Iâ€™ll be flying with on my next holiday!
